DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I behavior therapy development study seeks to improve treatment outcomes for methamphetamine (MA)-dependent subjects by developing a novel cognitive behavioral therapy- (CBT-) based short message service (SMS) text messaging intervention.
DOC.brief_title: A Cognitive Behavioral Therapy-Based Text Message Intervention for Methamphetamine Dependence
